markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Dragon's Eye Charm](/Equipment.aspx?ID=502)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Age of Ashes</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 71</row>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This charm, a dragon-shaped pendant worn like a necklace or set into armor or clothing as a decoration, is warm and smooth to the touch. It must be held in one hand to be used (pressing the palm of one’s hand to the charm also works, provided that your hand is otherwise empty). It has four distinct powers.

<document level="2" id="action-300" />

<document level="2" id="action-301" />

<document level="2" id="action-302" />

<document level="2" id="action-303" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Dragon's Eye Charm
